text: sheldon_cooper Alright , I 'm moving my infantry division , augmented by a battalion of Orcs from Lord of the Rings , we flank the Tennessee Volunteers , and the North once again wins the Battle of Gettysburg .
howard_wolowitz Not so fast , remember the South still has two infantry divisions , plus Superman and Godzilla .
leonard_hofstadter No , no , no , no , Orcs are magic , Superman is vulnerable to magic , not to mention , you already lost Godzilla to the Illinois Cavalry and Hulk .
raj_koothrappali Why do n't you just have Robert E. Lee charge the line with Shiva and Ganesh .
penny Hi , you guys ready to order ?
howard_wolowitz Hang on , honey . Shiva and Ganesh ? The Hindu Gods against the entire Union army ?
leonard_hofstadter And Orcs !
penny I 'll be back .
raj_koothrappali Excuse me , Ganesh is the remover of obstacles , and Shiva is the destroyer . When the smoke clears , Abraham Lincoln will be speaking Hindi and drinking mint juleps .
penny Alright , my boss says you either have to order , or leave and never come back .
howard_wolowitz What do you recommend for someone who worked up a man - sized appetite from a morning of weight training and cardio - funk ?
penny A shower .
howard_wolowitz I 'll take the heart smart platter .
penny Alright , thank you , and Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper We do n't eat here , I do n't know what 's good .
penny Well , it 's all good .
sheldon_cooper Statistically unlikely .
leonard_hofstadter Just get a hamburger , you like hamburgers .
sheldon_cooper I like the hamburgers where we usually have hamburgers , you ca n't make the assumption that I 'll like the hamburgers here .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm sorry . Give him a hamburger .
penny Uh , which one , the Classic Burger , the Ranch House Burger , the Barbecue Burger or the Kobe burger ?
sheldon_cooper Ca n't we just go to Big Boy ? They only have one burger . The Big Boy .
penny The Barbecue Burger is like the Big Boy .
sheldon_cooper Excuse me , in a world that already includes the Big Boy , why would I settle for something like a Big Boy ?
penny Because you are not at Big Boy !
sheldon_cooper Fine , I 'll have the Barbecue Burger .
leonard_hofstadter Make it two .
sheldon_cooper Waitresses do n't yell at you at Big Boy .
leslie_winkle Hey Leonard , hi guys .
leonard_hofstadter Hey Lesley .
leslie_winkle I did n't know you ate here .
sheldon_cooper We do n't . This is a disturbing aberration .
leonard_hofstadter Lesley , this is Penny , she lives across the hall from Sheldon and me .
howard_wolowitz And walks in quiet beauty like the night .
penny Howard , I 've asked you not to do that .
leonard_hofstadter Lesley and I do research together at the University .
penny Oh , wow , a girl scientist .
leslie_winkle Yep , come for the breasts , stay for the brains . So , I 'm glad I ran into you , the physics department string quartet needs a new cellist .
leonard_hofstadter What happened to Elliot Wong ?
leslie_winkle He switched over to high energy radiation research , had a little mishap , and now the other guys are uncomfortable sitting next to him . So , are you in ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , sure , why not .
leslie_winkle Great , we rehearse on Tuesdays at your place .
leonard_hofstadter Why at my place ?
leslie_winkle Yeah , the department of energy said our regular space is kind of a hot zone . Nice meeting you .
penny Yeah , you too . Leonard , I did n't know you played the cello ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , my parents felt that naming me Leonard and putting me in advanced placement classes was n't getting me beaten up enough .
howard_wolowitz If you 're into music , I happen to be a human beatbox .
penny Really ? I 'm actually not that into music . So hey , your friend 's really cute , anything going on with you two .
leonard_hofstadter Lesley ? No , no - oh , what are you kidding ?
sheldon_cooper He asked her out once , it was an embarrassing failure .
leonard_hofstadter Thank you Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper Oh , I 'm sorry , was that supposed to be a secret ?
penny Oh , that 's too bad , you guys would make a cute couple .
raj_koothrappali Oh dear .
howard_wolowitz What 's the matter ?
raj_koothrappali She did n't take my order .
howard_wolowitz How can she take your order when you 're too neurotic to talk to her .
raj_koothrappali Nevertheless , this will be reflected in her tip .
leonard_hofstadter What did Penny mean , you 'd make a cute couple ?

sheldon_cooper Well I assume she meant that the two of you together would constitute a couple that others might consider cute . An alternate , and somewhat less likely interpretation , is that you could manufacture one . As in , oh look , Leonard and Lesley made Mr and Mrs Goldfarb , are n't they adorable .

leonard_hofstadter If Penny did n't know that Lesley had already turned me down then that would unambiguously mean that she , Penny , thought that I should her , Lesley , out , indicating that she , Penny , had no interest in me asking her , Penny , out . But because she did know that I had asked Lesley out and that she , Lesley , had turned me down then she , Penny , could be offering consolation . That 's too bad , you would have made a cute couple . But while thinking , good , Leonard remains available .
sheldon_cooper You 're a lucky man , Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter How so ?
sheldon_cooper You 're talking to one of the three men in the Western hemisphere capable of following that train of thought .
leonard_hofstadter Well , what do you think .
sheldon_cooper I said I could follow it , I did n't say I cared .
leslie_winkle I admire your fingering .
leonard_hofstadter Thank you .
leslie_winkle Maybe some time you can try that on my instrument .
leslie_winkle Goodnight guys , good job .
male_string_quartettist Thanks .
female_string_quartettist See you next week .
leonard_hofstadter That was fun , Lesley , thanks for including me .
leslie_winkle You 're welcome . If you 're up for it we could practise that middle section again .
leonard_hofstadter Uh , sure , why not .
leslie_winkle Just so we 're clear , you understand that me hanging back to practise with you is a pretext for letting you know that I 'm sexually available .
leonard_hofstadter Really ?
leslie_winkle Yeah , I 'm good to go .
leonard_hofstadter I thought you were n't interested in me .
leslie_winkle That was before I saw you handling that beautiful piece of wood between your legs .
leonard_hofstadter You mean my cello ?
leslie_winkle No , I mean the obvious crude double entendre . I 'm seducing you .
leonard_hofstadter No kidding ?
leslie_winkle What can I say , I 'm a passionate and impulsive woman . So how about it ?
leonard_hofstadter Gee , uh ... .
leslie_winkle Is it the waitress ?
leonard_hofstadter Penny ? What about her ?
leslie_winkle Well , I thought I saw your pupils dilate when you looked at her , which , unless you 're a heroin addict , points to sexual attraction .

leonard_hofstadter Well , I did have a poppy seed bagel for breakfast , which could give a positive urine test for opiates but certainly not dilate my pupils , so I guess there 's no point in bringing it up .
leslie_winkle You and the waitress then ?
leonard_hofstadter No . No , there 's nothing going on between Penny and me .
leslie_winkle So , you 're open to a sexual relationship ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah . Yeah , I guess I am .
leslie_winkle Good .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , yeah it is good . Did you want to start now ?
leslie_winkle Why do n't we finish the section first .
leonard_hofstadter Oh . Okay . A little musical foreplay . Terrific .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm good , I 'm good to go .
leslie_winkle Me too .
penny Oh , hey Sheldon , what 's going on ?
sheldon_cooper I need your opinion on a matter of semiotics .
penny I 'm sorry ?
sheldon_cooper Semiotics , the study of signs and symbols , it 's a branch of philosophy related to linguistics .
penny Okay , sweetie , I know you think you 're explaining yourself , but you 're really not .
sheldon_cooper Just come with me .
sheldon_cooper Well ?
penny Well what ?
sheldon_cooper What does it mean ?
penny Oh , come on , you went to college .
sheldon_cooper Yes , but I was eleven .
penny Alright , look , a tie on the doorknob usually means someone does n't want to be disturbed because they 're , you know , getting busy .
sheldon_cooper So you 're saying Leonard has a girl in there .
penny Well , either that or he 's lost his tie rack and gotten really into Bryan Adams .
leslie_winkle Oh Leonard , you magnificent beast .
penny We really should n't be standing here .
sheldon_cooper This is very awkward .
penny Oh , come on , you know , Leonard 's had girls over before , right ?
sheldon_cooper Oh , yes , but there 's usually planning , courtship and advance notice . Last time I was able to book a cruise to the Arctic to see a solar eclipse .
penny Wait , you had to leave the state because your roommate was having sex ?
sheldon_cooper I did n't have to , the dates just happened to coincide .
penny So , do you know who 's in there ?
sheldon_cooper Well , there 's Leonard . And he 's either with Lesley Winkle or a 1930 's gangster .
penny Hmmm . Good for him . Good for Leonard . Okay , night .
sheldon_cooper No , no , wait , hold on .
penny What 's the matter ?
sheldon_cooper I do n't know what the protocol is here . Do I stay , do I leave ? Do I wait to greet them with a refreshing beverage ?
penny Gee , Sheldon , you 're asking the wrong girl . I 'm usually on the other side of the tie .
sheldon_cooper Hi , Leonard . It 's me , Sheldon . In the living room . I just , I wanted you to know I saw the tie . Message received . You 're welcome . You carry on . Give my best to Lesley .
sheldon_cooper Big boy ! Someone touched my board . Oh God , my board . Leonard ! Leonard !
leonard_hofstadter Hey , what 's the matter ?
sheldon_cooper My equations , someone 's tampered with my equations .
leonard_hofstadter Are you sure ?
sheldon_cooper Of course I 'm sure . Look at the beta - function of quantum chromodynamics , the sign 's been changed .
leonard_hofstadter Oh yeah . But does n't that fix the problem you 've been having ?
sheldon_cooper Are you insane ? Are you out of your mind ? Are you ... hey look , that fixes the problem I 've been having .
leslie_winkle You 're welcome .
sheldon_cooper You did this ?
leslie_winkle Yeah , I noticed it when I got up to get a glass of water , so I fixed it , now you can show that quarks are asymptotically free at high energies . Pretty cool , huh ?
sheldon_cooper Cool ?
leslie_winkle Listen , I got to hit the lab . Thanks for a great night .
leonard_hofstadter Thank you , I 'll see you at work .
sheldon_cooper Uh - duh , hold on , hold on !
leslie_winkle What ?
sheldon_cooper Who told you you could touch my board ?
leslie_winkle No - one .
sheldon_cooper I do n't come into your house and touch your board .
leslie_winkle There are no incorrect equations on my board .
sheldon_cooper Oh , that is so ... . so ... .
leslie_winkle I 'm sorry , I 've got to run , if you come up with an adjective , text me . .
sheldon_cooper Inconsiderate , that is the adjective , inconsiderate .
leonard_hofstadter You can stare at your board all day Sheldon , she 's still going to be right .
sheldon_cooper I 'm not staring , I 'm mulling .
penny Oh , hey Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , hi .
penny So , how 's it going ?
leonard_hofstadter Pretty good .
penny Just pretty good , I 'd think you were doing very good .
leonard_hofstadter Pretty , very , there 's really no objective scale for delineating variations of good , why do you ask ?
penny Well , a little bird told me that you and Lesley hooked up last night .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon !
sheldon_cooper I 'm coming .
penny So , is it serious , do you like her ?
leonard_hofstadter Wuh , I do n't ... th - th - th - that 's really two different questions , uh , I 'm not ... Sheldon , we have to go !
sheldon_cooper Boy , you 're wound awfully tight for a man who just had sexual intercourse .
penny Alright , well , I 'll talk to you later , but , I am so happy for you Leonard .

leonard_hofstadter Thank you . What did she mean , she 's happy for me ? Is she happy because I 'm seeing someone , or is she happy because she thinks that I 'm happy , because anyone who cared for someone would want them to be happy , even if the reason for their happiness made the first person unhappy . You know , because the second person , though happy , is now romantically unavailable to the first person .
sheldon_cooper Do you realize I may have to share a Nobel Prize with your booty call ?
leonard_hofstadter You know what , I 'm being ridiculous . But who cares what Penny thinks , Lesley is a terrific girl , she 's attractive , we like each other , she 's extremely intelligent .
sheldon_cooper She 's not that intelligent .
leonard_hofstadter She fixed your equation .
sheldon_cooper She got lucky .
leonard_hofstadter You do n't believe in luck .
sheldon_cooper I do n't have to believe in it for her to be lucky .

leonard_hofstadter Regardless , I have a chance at a real relationship with Lesley , I 'm not going to pass that up for some hypothetical future happiness with a woman who may or may not want me to be happy with a woman who is currently making me happy .
sheldon_cooper Leonard ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah .
sheldon_cooper I still do n't care .
leonard_hofstadter Hey , Lesley .
leslie_winkle Careful Leonard , liquid nitrogen , 320 degrees below zero .
leonard_hofstadter Brrrr . Why are you smashing a flash frozen banana .
leslie_winkle Because I 've got a bowl of Cheerios and I could n't find a knife .
leonard_hofstadter So anyway Hello .
leslie_winkle Uh , what are you doing ?
leonard_hofstadter Just extending the intimacy . Do you want to slip over to the radiation lab and share a decontamination shower ?
leslie_winkle Okay , uh , what exactly do you think 's going on between us ?
leonard_hofstadter I 'm not sure , but I think I 'm about to discover how the banana felt .

leslie_winkle Listen , Leonard , neither of us are neuroscientists but we both understand the biochemistry of sex , I mean , dopamine in our brains is released across synapses causing pleasure . You stick electrodes in a rat 's brain , give him an orgasm button , he 'll push that thing until he starves to death .
leonard_hofstadter Who would n't ?
leslie_winkle Well , the only difference between us and a rat is that you ca n't stick an electrode in our hypothalamus . That 's where you come in .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , well , I 'm just glad to be a part of it . So what happens now ?
leslie_winkle Well , I do n't know about your sex drive , but I 'm probably good till New Years .
leonard_hofstadter Oh . Okay . Thank you .
leslie_winkle Thank you !
leonard_hofstadter You want to make plans for New Years .
leslie_winkle Woah , Leonard , please , you 're smothering me .
leonard_hofstadter Sorry .
howard_wolowitz Hey , look , it 's Doctor Stud !
leonard_hofstadter Doctor what ?
howard_wolowitz The blogosphere is a - buzzing with news of you and Lesley Winkle making eine kleine bang - bang music .
leonard_hofstadter Wha ... how did it get on the internet ?
howard_wolowitz I put it there .
leonard_hofstadter Well , how did you know about it ?
raj_koothrappali A little bird told us . Apparently you are a magnificent beast .
leonard_hofstadter Well , that part 's true !
sheldon_cooper You know , I think I may have misjudged this restaurant .
leonard_hofstadter No kidding .
sheldon_cooper I wo n't go out on a limb , but I think we may be looking at my new Tuesday hamburger .
leonard_hofstadter Your old Tuesday hamburger will be so broken hearted .
sheldon_cooper Way ahead of you . I was thinking of moving Big Boy to Thursdays , and just dropping Soup Plantation .
leonard_hofstadter Really ?
sheldon_cooper Yeah , the name always confused me anyway , Soup Plantation . You ca n't grow soup .
penny So , how 's everything .
sheldon_cooper Terrific , you 'll be happy to know that I plan to come here every Tuesday night for the foreseeable future .
penny Really , oh yay !
sheldon_cooper Who do I speak to about permanently reserving this table ?
penny Um , I do n't know , a psychiatrist ? So hey , how are things with you and Lesley ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , to be honest , I do n't think it 's going to work out .
penny Oh , oh that 's too bad . Well hey , do n't worry , I 'm sure there is someone out there who is just right for you . .
leonard_hofstadter Well what did she mean by that ? Was that just a generic platitude or was that a subtle bid for attention ?

sheldon_cooper You know why this hamburger surpasses the Big Boy ? This is a single decker hamburger whereas the Big Boy is a double decker . This has a much more satisfying meat to bun to condiment ratio .
leonard_hofstadter Are you even listening to me ?
sheldon_cooper Of course I 'm listening . Blah blah , hopeless Penny delusion , blah blah blah .
leonard_hofstadter Okay then . You know , you can grow the ingredients for soup . .
